name: repositoryType
description: Type for access of external URI.

allowed_values.description: When URL is clicked, the resource can be seen directly (by webpage or by download link format).

allowed_values.display: The URL is the RESTful or other kind of API that can access to the result.
allowed_values.description: When the API method (e.g. [base_url]/[parameter]) related with the URL of the website is executed, the resource can be seen directly (usually in JSON or XML format).

allowed_values.display: Result cannot be access unless an account is logged in
allowed_values.description: When logged into the website, the resource can be seen.

allowed_values.display: Result need to be fetched with API and need LOGIN( or cookies are required when visiting the link of resource)
allowed_values.description: When logged in and  follow the API in the website related with URL, the resource can be seen.

allowed_values.display: Some other complicated or particular way to get resource from URL.
allowed_values.description: Some other complicated or particular way to get resource from URL.
